title: Report missing Points
description:
### Missing Points from a past stay
It can take up to two weeks after check-out to see your Points appear in your account.

You can [report a missing stay](https://www.hilton.com) if it has been over two weeks. We'll collect some information about your stay and have a customer care agent contact you.
### Missing Points from a cancellation
If you made a reservation with Points, it can take up to 48 hours after you canceled for your Points to appear back in your account.

Need to make another reservation and need your Points back sooner? Our customer care agents would be happy to help.
